title: Deep Sightings and Rescue Missions: Fiction, Essays, and Conversations
description: On December 9, 1995, Toni Cade Bambara died of cancer at the age of 56. In its obituary of her, The New York Times called Bambara, "a major contributor to the emerging genre of black women's literature." Deep Sightings and Rescue Missions offers an expected a rich selection of Bambara's writings, most of which have never before appeared in print.
author: Toni Cade Bambara
